LanguageData.FrostLungs.stages.major.label: average
LanguageData.FrostLungs.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.FrostLungs.description: Disease causing a sharp decrease in body temperature.
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.label: Fibrodysplasia
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.minor.label: pale skin
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.easy.label: skin damage
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.medium.label: deep penetration
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.hard.label: damage of internal tissues
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.ultrahard.label: destruction of body part
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.description: A rare and serious disease causing gradual destruction of body tissues.
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWorms.label: Neurofibromatous Worms
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWorms.stages.easy.label: internal lesion
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWorms.description: A disease that develops under the influence of intractable parasites in the brain. Characterized by gradual loss of vision and hearing.
LanguageData.CaveBettleBuff.label: Night Hunt
LanguageData.CaveBettleBuff.description: Эволюционный механизм ускорения метаболизма при естественном для организма уровне освещения.
